messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: there are [0-9]+ clusters'

Imagine a class of 15 students. Vivian, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, and Gongxue are all connected to each other. Paul, Solomon, Soheil, Gongxue, and Alice are connected to each other. Pierre, Abdul, Durga, Ajit, and Soheil are all connected to each other. Noah, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, and Anisha are connected to each other. Solomon, Soheil, Gongxue, and Alice are connected to each other. Abdul, Durga, Ajit, and Anisha are connected to each other. Salma, Shanshan, and Vadim are connected to each other. Soheil is connected to Alice. Durga, Ajit and Anisha are connected to each other. Shanshan is connected to Vadim. Gongxue is connected to Alice. Ajit is connected to Anisha. How many densely-connected clusters do we have in this class? A densely-connected cluster is a group of students that are connected to themselves with a max of 2 students.

Step 1: Identify the clusters by examining each connection.
Step 2: Check each cluster to see if they meet the criteria for being densely connected (max of 2 students per connection).

Cluster 1: Vivian, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, and Gongxue
Cluster 2: Paul, Solomon, Soheil, Gongxue, and Alice
Cluster 3: Pierre, Abdul, Durga, Ajit, and Soheil
Cluster 4: Noah, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, and Anisha
Cluster 5: Solomon, Soheil, Gongxue, and Alice
Cluster 6: Abdul, Durga, Ajit, and Anisha
Cluster 7: Salma, Shanshan, and Vadim
Cluster 8: Soheil and Alice
Cluster 9: Durga, Ajit and Anisha
Cluster 10: Shanshan and Vadim
Cluster 11: Gongxue and Alice
Cluster 12: Ajit and Anisha

Step 3: Count the number of densely connected clusters

Cluster 1: Not dense (more than 2 students)
Cluster 2: Not dense (more than 2 students)
Cluster 3: Not dense (more than 2 students)
Cluster 4: Not dense (more than 2 students)
Cluster 5: Not dense (more than 2 students)
Cluster 6: Not dense (more than 2 students)
Cluster 7: Not dense (more than 2 students)
Cluster 8: Densely connected (2 students)
Cluster 9: Not dense (more than 2 students)
Cluster 10: Densely connected (2 students)
Cluster 11: Densely connected (2 students)
Cluster 12: Densely connected (2 students)

Answer: there are 4 clusters
